00070     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00071         return PRODUCT_NAME.equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00072     }
00073 
00074     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00075         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:sqlserver")) {
00076             return "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver";
00077         } else if (url.startsWith("jdbc:jtds:sqlserver")) {
00078             return "net.sourceforge.jtds.jdbc.Driver";
00079         }
00080         return null;
00081     }

00129     public String getDefaultCatalogName() throws JDBCException {
00130         try {
00131             return getConnection().getCatalog();
00132         } catch (SQLException e) {
00133             throw new JDBCException(e);
00134         }
00135     }

00145     public String getConcatSql(String... values) {
00146         StringBuffer returnString = new StringBuffer();
00147         for (String value : values) {
00148             returnString.append(value).append(" + ");
00149         }
00150 
00151         return returnString.toString().replaceFirst(" \\+ $", "");
00152     }

00195     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00196         return true;

00200     public boolean isSystemTable(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00201         return super.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, tableName) || schemaName.equals("sys");
00202     }
00203 
00204     public boolean isSystemView(String catalogName, String schemaName, String viewName) {
00205         return super.isSystemView(catalogName, schemaName, viewName) || schemaName.equals("sys");
00206     }
00207 
00208     public String generateDefaultConstraintName(String tableName, String columnName) {
00209         return "DF_" + tableName + "_" + columnName;
00210     }
00211 
00212 
00213     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00214         if (defaultValue == null) {
00215             return null;
00216         }
00217 
00218         if (defaultValue instanceof String) {
00219             if (((String) defaultValue).startsWith("('")) {
00220                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^\\('", "").replaceFirst("'\\)$", "");
00221             } else if (((String) defaultValue).startsWith("((")) {
00222                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^\\(\\(", "").replaceFirst("\\)\\)$", "");
00223             }
00224         }
00225 
00226         defaultValue = super.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00227 
00228         return defaultValue;
00229     }
00230 
00231     public String escapeTableName(String schemaName, String tableName) {
00232         if (schemaName == null) {
00233             return "[" + tableName + "]";
00234         } else {
00235             return "[" + schemaName + "].[" + tableName + "]";
00236         }
00237     }
00238 
00239     public String escapeConstraintName(String constraintName) {
00240         if (constraintName == null) {
00241             return null;
00242         }
00243         return "[" + constraintName + "]";
00244     }
00245 
00246 
00247     public String convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00248         return getDefaultCatalogName();
00249     }
00250 
00251     public String convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00252         if (requestedSchema == null) {
00253             return "dbo";
00254         }
00255         return requestedSchema;
00256     }
00257 
00258     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String viewName) throws JDBCException {
00259         String sql = "select view_definition from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS where upper(table_name)='" + viewName.toUpperCase() + "'";
00260 //        if (StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName) != null) {
00261         sql += " and table_schema='" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName) + "'";
00262         sql += " and table_catalog='" + getDefaultCatalogName() + "'";
00263 //        }
00264 
00265 //        log.info("GetViewDefinitionSQL: "+sql);
00266         return new RawSqlStatement(sql);
00267     }
00268 
00269     public String getColumnType(String columnType, Boolean autoIncrement) {
00270         String type = super.getColumnType(columnType, autoIncrement);
00271         if (autoIncrement != null && autoIncrement) {
00272             type = type.replaceFirst(" identity$", "");
00273         }
00274         return type;
00275     }
00276 
00277     public String getDateLiteral(String isoDate) {
00278         return super.getDateLiteral(isoDate).replace(' ', 'T');
00279     }

00281     public DatabaseSnapshot createDatabaseSnapshot(String schema, Set<DiffStatusListener> statusListeners) throws JDBCException {
00282         return new MSSQLDatabaseSnapshot(this, statusListeners, schema);
00283     }

00285     public boolean supportsRestrictForeignKeys() {
00286         return false;
